outline:
1. to place, set, stand, set or station oneself, present oneself
    1. (Hithpael) to station oneself, take one's stand, stand, present oneself, stand with someone
kjv_def: present selves, remaining, resort, set (selves), (be able to, can, with-) stand (fast, forth, -ing, still, up).
strongs_def: to place (any thing so as to stay); reflexively, to station, offer, continue
